mapper.insert:
SELECT SEQ_ROUTE_NO.NEXTVAL AS routeNo FROM DUAL
INSERT INTO WALK_ROUTE( ROUTE_NO, ROUTE_NAME, ROUTE_THUMBNAIL, ROUTE_DEPARTURES, ROUTE_DESTINATION, ROUTE_LOCATIONS, ROUTE_PUBLIC, ROUTE_CREATE_DATE, MEMBER_NO ) VALUES( SEQ_ROUTE_NO.NEXTVAL, #{routeName}, #{routeThumbnail}, #{routeDepartures}, #{routeDestination}, #{routeLocations}, #{routePublic}, DEFAULT, #{memberNo} )

SELECT SEQ_MY_ROUTE_NO.CURRVAL AS myRouteNo FROM DUAL
INSERT INTO WALK_MY_ROUTE( MY_ROUTE_NO, MY_ROUTE_NAME, MY_ROUTE_THUMBNAIL, MY_ROUTE_DEPARTURES, MY_ROUTE_DESTINATION, MY_ROUTE_LOCATIONS, ROUTE_CREATE_DATE MEMBER_NO, ) VALUES( SEQ_MY_ROUTE_NO.NEXTVAL, #{myRouteName}, #{myRouteThumbnail}, #{myRouteDepartures}, #{myRouteDestination}, #{myRouteLocations}, DEFAULT, #{memberNo} )
INSERT INTO USER_RATING ( RATING_USER_NO, RATING_TARGET_MEMBER_NO, WALK_RATING_SCORE, MEMBER_NO ) VALUES ( SEQ_RATING_USER_NO.NEXTVAL, #{ratingTargetMemberNo}, #{walkRatingScore}, #{memberNo}, )

SELECT SEQ_ROUTE_RATING_NO.NEXTVAL AS routeRatingNo FROM DUAL
INSERT INTO ROUTE_RATING ( MEMBER_NO, ROUTE_RATING_SCORE, ROUTE_RATING_NO, ROUTE_NO ) VALUES( #{memberNo}, #{routeRatingScore}, SEQ_ROUTE_RATING_NO.NEXTVAL, #{routeNo} )

SELECT SEQ_WALK_PARTICIPANT_NO.NEXTVAL AS walkParticipantNo FROM DUAL
INSERT INTO WALK_PARTICIPANT ( WALK_PARTICIPANT_NO, PARTY_NO, MEMBER_NO ) VALUES ( SEQ_WALK_PARTICIPANT_NO.NEXTVAL, #{partyNo}, #{memberNo} )

INSERT INTO WALK_PARTY ( PARTY_NO, PARTY_NAME, PARTY_CATEGORY, PARTY_DEPARTURES, PARTY_DESTINATION, PARTY_CREATEDATE, PARTY_DEPARTUREDATE, MEMBER_NO ROUTE_NO ) VALUES ( SEQ_PARTY_NO.NEXTVAL, #{partyName}, #{partyCategory}, #{partyDepartures}, #{partyDestination}, DEFAULT, DEFAULT, #{memberNo}, #{routeNo} )
mapper.select: SELECT ROUTE_NO as ROUTE_NO, ROUTE_NAME as ROUTE_NAME, ROUTE_THUMBNAIL as ROUTE_THUMBNAIL, ROUTE_DEPARTURES as ROUTE_DEPARTURES, ROUTE_DESTINATION as ROUTE_DESTINATION, ROUTE_LOCATIONS as ROUTE_LOCATIONS, ROUTE_PUBLIC as ROUTE_PUBLIC, ROUTE_CREATE_DATE as ROUTE_CREATE_DATE, MEMBER_NO as MEMBER_NO FROM WALK_ROUTE WHERE MEMBER_NO = #{MemberNo}

SELECT ROUTE_NO as ROUTE_NO, ROUTE_NAME as ROUTE_NAME, ROUTE_THUMBNAIL as ROUTE_THUMBNAIL, ROUTE_DEPARTURES as ROUTE_DEPARTURES, ROUTE_DESTINATION as ROUTE_DESTINATION, ROUTE_LOCATIONS as ROUTE_LOCATIONS, ROUTE_PUBLIC as ROUTE_PUBLIC, ROUTE_CREATE_DATE as ROUTE_CREATE_DATE, MEMBER_NO as MEMBER_NO FROM WALK_ROUTE WHERE MEMBER_NO = #{MemberNo}
SELECT WALK_PARTICIPANT_NO as WALK_PARTICIPANT_NO, PARTY_NO as PARTY_NO, MEMBER_NO as MEMBER_NO FROM WALK_PARTICIPANT WHERE MEMBER_NO = #{MemberNo}
